title: Can't sign up for PBE.
body: I've tried to sign up for PBE Testing for over a month, but the website is still down. Could I get an update on what's going on with the website? I'm becoming very worried.

replies.body: PBE signups are still closed for maintenance. I don't really have any timeline as to when they'll be open again, but the main reason for it being down is so that we can make things run a little smoother in the future! The best way to keep updated on our progress is by checking up on the [**status page**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe).
